shortdesc.ph: Publishes the local stream to a specified CDN live streaming URL.

p.codeblock: public abstract int addPublishStreamUrlEx( String url, boolean transcodingEnabled, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int addPublishStreamUrlEx(const char* url, bool transcodingEnabled, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;

section.p: After calling this method, you can push media streams in RTMP or RTMPS protocol to the CDN according to . The SDK triggers the callback on the local client to report the state of adding a local stream to the CDN.

ul.li: Call this method after joining a channel.
Ensure that the Media Push function is enabled. For details, see the prerequisites in Media Push.
This method takes effect only when you are a host in live interactive streaming.
This method adds only one streaming URL to the CDN each time it is called. To push multiple URLs, call this method multiple times.
In one instance, you can only push one upstream media stream to the CDN (such as the video stream captured by the camera or the video stream for screen sharing selected by the ).

< 0: Failure.
-2: Invalid parameter, usually an empty URL or a string with a length of 0.
-7: The engine is not initialized when streaming.
